summary: CI build on Windows fails during compilation of the workflow-isolate-extension due to errors in the isolated-vm library dependency.
userImpact: Windows users cannot build the SDK due to CI failures preventing the workflow-isolate-extension from compiling.
rootCause: Errors in isolated-vm/lib dependency causing build failures on Windows platform during GitHub Actions workflow.
resolutionDetails: Issue was addressed and resolved (closed status), though specific fix details are not documented in the issue.
keyQuote: windows-latest failed during building of the workflow-isolate-extension due to errors that seem to originate in isolated-vm/lib
